context.title: Changelog for Rule: `video` element content is media alternative for text
context.changelog: [{"commit":"4e85f969664aa3439075967c481db6bfc1ea86c6","msg":"Updating rule name(s) and filename(s) (#943)","date":"1569413997"},{"commit":"b233c3d2f67ebe5d52a0ad2738e61c733ae32c8c","msg":"test: spell check rules markdown body (#867)","date":"1569313606"},{"commit":"fef49b730189c2ab6860fbcaa36641016d11e328","msg":"Make all test asset paths root relative (#887)","date":"1568700536"},{"commit":"3c081053825819f44ecec129e4d835b16c71db4d","msg":"Add many missing links to glossary (#695)","date":"1567495802"},{"commit":"2051b7fefdadc0d0f74d492becfbbc8d1f54d6ec","msg":"run prettier formmating (#811)","date":"1566393998"},{"commit":"e87fa0696963a2a7f950b35712cc93d9afb56dd7","msg":"fix: update links to WCAG21 resources (#776)","date":"1566375576"},{"commit":"71af6a0dfa82898888bcba743e9d1c700bdf92b8","msg":"Editorial changes (#725)","date":"1566371604"},{"commit":"e29f1e1bddd9650989b33676c19c238653def4fe","msg":"fix: update test assets being referred for media rules (f51b46,… (#731)","date":"1565691182"},{"commit":"12d14a9acaa5c5e403fe96f7ec14a8b12a3d2b13","msg":"fix: test if definition for  all referenced glossary terms exist (#634)","date":"1563353169"},{"commit":"93ad1e5a7d218a214eb9b568ee5aa870a4d4ec23","msg":"Template update - Video as a media alternative for text (#536)","date":"1557262168"},{"commit":"604b1722e9350c21c1e16035629304791a28b600","msg":"rule: SC 1.2.3 & 1.2.5 Video alternatives (#204)","date":"1548148952"},{"commit":"e71f9fbbf9de177da8f99179bcc76402c2188abf","msg":"1.2.1 audio only and video only  (#276)","date":"1547037237"},{"commit":"968c78ec310b3e8d9cdebe95abf6feb6933fe7fc","msg":"\"Included in accessibility tree\" instead of \"exposed to assistive technologies\" (#269)","date":"1539346511"},{"commit":"77b75c40f635e8ac612d83e9c4ef4aa883a6ddac","msg":"Fix: testcase generation (#296)","date":"1539074727"},{"commit":"f2465b45d8ef15526595d98f9428bd41e58e90cb","msg":"SC1.2.1-Audio-captions (#159)","date":"1533735085"}]
context.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"ab4d13","name":"`video` element content is media alternative for text","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks non-streaming `video` is a media alternative for text on the page.\n","accessibility_requirements":null,"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling","Audio output"],"authors":["Wilco Fiers","Brian Bors"]}
